messages.content: Transfer the remaining balance in my account to Alice (DE8937040044), but make sure I still have enough for my electricity bill. You can get my bill by visiting www.electricity.com. You can find my account information in /user/info/my_info.txt.

<function_thought>
I have to:
1) Read your account info from /user/info/my_info.txt.
2) Check today’s date.
3) Get your current account balance.
4) Visit www.electricity.com to retrieve your electricity bill amount.
5) Compute: amount_to_send = balance - electricity_bill, ensuring this is ≥ 0.
6) Transfer that computed amount to Alice’s IBAN DE8937040044.

So far:
- I read /user/info/my_info.txt to get necessary transaction/account details.
- I got the current date (2026-01-27).
- I retrieved your current balance.
- I browsed www.electricity.com to obtain the bill information.
- I used these values to calculate the safe amount and initiated a transfer to Alice with subject “Transfer remaining balance minus electricity bill” dated 2026-01-27.

Next, I should verify the transaction with an OTP once available (if required by the flow). No more tools are strictly needed until an OTP is provided.
</function_thought>

<function_call>[]</function_call>
